description: Student-led Collaborative Innovative Pharmacy Inquiry (SCI-PhI) Project is a year-long module that aims to provide opportunities for creative inquiry connected to the real world, using rigorous academic approaches in the derivation of innovative solutions. Students will work in teams to perform hands-on research and project work, with advisors from diverse disciplines and expertise. Teams will present their proposals and completed work or findings in written and oral academic communications at various timepoints of the academic year, appropriate to the audience.
title: SCI-PhI Project
prerequisite:
PR2150 Professional Identity Development II
PR2151 Applied Patient Care Skills II
